required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Characteristics and Prognostic Factors of Patients With COVID-19
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Characteristics and Prognostic Factors of Patients With COVID-19 in Chibi Hospital of Hubei Province

brief_summary.textblock: As of February 17th, 2020, China has 70635 confirmed cases of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), including 1772 deaths. Human-to-human spread of virus via respiratory droplets is currently considered to be the main route of transmission. The number of patients increased rapidly but the impact factors of clinical outcomes among hospitalized patients are still unclear.

detailed_description.textblock: As of February 17th, 2020, China has 70635 confirmed cases of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), including 1772 deaths. Human-to-human spread of virus via respiratory droplets is currently considered to be the main route of transmission. The number of patients increased rapidly but the impact factors of clinical outcomes among hospitalized patients are still unclear.

primary_outcome.measure: Time to negative conversion of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2
primary_outcome.description: The primary outcome is the time to negative conversion of coronavirus

secondary_outcome.description: The rate of survival within hospitalization of these patients will be tracked. The rate of survival within hospitalization of these patients will be tracked. The rate of survival within hospitalization of these patients will be tracked. The rate of survival within hospitalization of these patients will be tracked.
The rate of intubation within hospitalization of these patients will be tracked

intervention.description: The investigators retrospectively analyzed the hospitalized patients with COVID-19

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult aged >=18years old; Diagnosed with CONVID19. Diagnostic criteria including: Laboratory (RT-PCR) confirmed SARS-Cov-2 infection; CT of the lung conformed to the manifestation of viral pneumonia.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Near-death state (expected survival time less than 24 hours); Malignant tumor; Pregnancy or puerperium women; Patients who refused to participant.
